data.name: 0000 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I left interviewing the computer club to Nagato while the rest of us met up with Haruhi.

data.name: 0001 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Ah—where'd Yuki go?

data.name: 0002 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: So I explained that she went to ask the computer society questions.

data.name: 0003 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: #DP

data.name: 0004 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Upon hearing this, Haruhi assumed a ponderous expression and sank into silence.

data.name: 0005 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Don't tell me—she suspects that we might be hiding something from her?

data.name: 0006 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I needed some kind of excuse to change the topic... But before I could think of one—

data.name: 0007 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I don't think there's any point in all of us searching in one group.

data.name: 0008 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Said our Lord Brigade Leader, as if her con- clusion came after extensive consideration.

data.name: 0009 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …Why do you say that all of a sudden?

data.name: 0010 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: When I heard that Yuki left to interrogate the club I was suddenly inspired!

data.name: 0011 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I don't know what caused her inspiration, but it seemed like just a standard realization.

data.name: 0012 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: From here we should all split up and search on our own!

data.name: 0013 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Wait wait—what about my sister?

data.name: 0014 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'll take your little sister with me.

data.name: 0015 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'm glad someone's looking after her, but I'm not sure I can feel at ease when it's you.

data.name: 0016 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Miss Suzumiya, how should we go about carrying out our search?

data.name: 0017 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: How about we decide a meetup time, split into groups, and look around?

data.name: 0019 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Eehh—we're going to all be separated...?

data.name: 0020 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Exactly. Even Yuki went to investigate on her own.

data.name: 0021 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I-I get what you mean buuut…

data.name: 0022 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Mikuru—don't tell me you're scared?

data.name: 0023 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: N-no…

data.name: 0024 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You don't have to push yourself or anything, but it's not going to be scary, okay?

data.name: 0025 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Ehh, o-okayyy…

data.name: 0026 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina was like a single daisy in a strong wind.

data.name: 0027 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: So small and trembling and frightened...

data.name: 0028 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Oh right—I managed to overhear something interesting.

data.name: 0029 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: What did you overhear, I wonder?

data.name: 0030 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: A certain somebody said they were walking down a corridor with no signs of anyone else—

data.name: 0031 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Behind them, they could hear another set of footsteps following along.

data.name: 0033 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Eek!

data.name: 0034 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Thinking it was strange, they looked back and got the feeling that someone was there...

data.name: 0035 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: But there was nobody there at all.

data.name: 0036 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #SK0W-waaah...

data.name: 0037 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: With that unnecessarily vivid narration, Asahina started turning pale.

data.name: 0038 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Oi—Haruhi!

data.name: 0039 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What?! I'm just getting to the good part!

data.name: 0040 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: They continued down the corridor thinking it was all in their head, but again the footsteps…

data.name: 0041 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #SK0Wwawawa— #SK0Th-that can really happen?

data.name: 0042 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Indeed, but that's not all—

data.name: 0043 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: They kept looking over their shoulder in discomfort, until they looked back and…

data.name: 0044 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #SK0Th-they looked back and…?

data.name: 0045 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: From a place where nobody should have been...#W30

data.name: 0046 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Suddenly, a human face!

data.name: 0047 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #SK0Hyyyaaaaa!

data.name: 0048 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina just might faint from the shock of that ghost story.

data.name: 0050 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: And in addition to that—

data.name: 0051 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hey—that's enough of that. Don't scare Asahina any further.

data.name: 0052 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She was about five seconds away from bursting into tears because of your story.

data.name: 0053 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: And if something like that actually happened, I wouldn't be able to bear it!

data.name: 0054 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Jeez—it was just getting exciting. Don't ruin it!

data.name: 0055 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: But, well—we are burning daylight, so I'll leave it there.

data.name: 0056 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Is that what you have to say after stirring up so much fear? What a person.

data.name: 0057 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Aaaahhhh, i-it's over, right? Thank goodness.

data.name: 0058 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Now that the story is over, Asahina finally seems to be at ease.

data.name: 0059 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: So like I was saying originally—we're going to split up and search around!

data.name: 0060 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Eeeeeh—! P-please no...

data.name: 0062 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Understood.

data.name: 0063 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hey—you're kidding right?!

data.name: 0064 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Not only scaring people but also sending them out alone—

data.name: 0065 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: How cruel can you be… not that I wasn't already aware of that though.

data.name: 0066 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: U-um… Is it okay if I at least go together with Kyon?

data.name: 0067 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Why of course, Miss Asahina—I'd love to go with you.

data.name: 0068 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: No. Rejected. Absolutely not. That would be terribly inefficient.

data.name: 0069 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: C'mon, c'mon—get moving already! You got that, Mikuru!?

data.name: 0070 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Aaaah—please no…

data.name: 0071 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina resisted until the very end—

data.name: 0072 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: But she was no match for Haruhi's persistence…

data.name: 0073 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: So we all went off in different directions by ourselves.

data.name: 0074 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: —Is what should've happened at least.

data.name: 0075 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: #P06Hold on!

data.name: 0076 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Mm? H-hey—what are you doing?!

data.name: 0077 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Just as I started to walk, Haruhi suddenly pulled me out of view.

data.name: 0079 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: #P06I believe we'll now be taking part in a special operation.

data.name: 0080 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Before I knew it Koizumi appeared. What happened to Asahina?

data.name: 0081 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: #P06We're gonna make Mikuru the protagonist of a horror movie.

data.name: 0082 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: #P06What? What's that supposed to mean?

data.name: 0083 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: #P06We're gonna follow behind her stealthily and film her.

data.name: 0084 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: #P06We should be able to get some really nice shots.

data.name: 0085 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Talk about poor taste—and as for why we're doing this, I have no idea.

data.name: 0086 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: #P06Quit your grumbling. Look—follow her!

data.name: 0087 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: #P06Understood.

data.name: 0088 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: #P06Oi—wait up!

data.name: 0089 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: There was no way I could just let Haruhi do as she pleases.

data.name: 0090 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: But without any choice in the matter, I decided to accompany them.

data.name: 0091 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: By the way, why are we recording such a thing all of a sudden?

data.name: 0092 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It was probably pointless to ask for a solid reason—but just in case, I did anyway.

data.name: 0093 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What do you mean "why?" It's for the SOS Brigade activity record, obviously!

data.name: 0094 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It just struck me earlier—beautiful girls are an absolute must for horror.

data.name: 0095 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: We're just following that tried-and-true tradition!

data.name: 0096 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It's just that I thought we should try looking for some new appeal in Mikuru.

data.name: 0097 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Even without looking for it, Asahina's appeal is more than satisfactory.

data.name: 0098 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Actually—where did you even get that video camera from in the first place?

data.name: 0099 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: No matter how you look at it—you have some terrible hobbies.

data.name: 0100 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You don't get it, do you.

data.name: 0101 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It's important to look at things from an outside-the-box perspective isn't it?

data.name: 0102 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: What nerve to say such a thing while recording a terrified-looking Asahina.

data.name: 0103 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: As expected—Miss Suzumiya's way of thinking differs from the average person.

data.name: 0104 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Oi Koizumi. Don't butter Haruhi up too much—she'll get carried away, you know.

data.name: 0105 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Just like that, with us dubious stalkers following unbeknownst to her…

data.name: 0108 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Aaaaah… I-it's just my imagination, right…? That slight sound of footsteps…

data.name: 0109 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If three amateurs are tailing you, it's only natural to hear footsteps.

data.name: 0110 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: T-there's no one there… Right?

data.name: 0111 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She occasionally gave a timid look back over her shoulder, then continued on again.

data.name: 0112 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Uuh—I just remembered that story from earlier… What should I do…

data.name: 0113 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: #P06Yes—nice facial expression, Mikuru! Good. That's right on the mark!

data.name: 0114 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Every time Asahina gets startled, you're there gleefully recording it. Shameless.

data.name: 0115 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: But even I must admit—the sight of a beautiful girl looking scared isn't bad at all.

data.name: 0116 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …Having thought something like that, I'm going to need some self-reflection.

data.name: 0117 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: No, hold on—I feel really bad for Asahina right now.

data.name: 0118 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I have to do something about it…

data.name: 0119 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Asahin—#W60

data.name: 0120 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #SK0Hyyyaaaaa?! A v-voice!?

data.name: 0121 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Ah—

data.name: 0122 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I terrified her. Did that backfire?

data.name: 0123 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Eeek!

data.name: 0124 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She was in such a panic that she seemingly stepped on something and fell over.

data.name: 0125 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Oouch… I-it hurts…

data.name: 0126 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: #P06Nice going, Mikuru! You're pulling off the perfect clumsy girl!

data.name: 0127 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Ah, I was trying to reassure her, but I accidentally did something awful…

data.name: 0128 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Incidentally—I wonder what could Asahina have stepped on?

data.name: 0129 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hm? This is what she stepped on? I wonder whose #P05handkerchief#P00 this is?

data.name: 0130 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I think I'll hold on to this for the time being.

data.name: 0131 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: #P06Koizumi—I feel way too bad for Asahina.

data.name: 0132 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: #P06You should also tell Haruhi to call this off.

data.name: 0133 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: #P06That's quite troubling I'm afraid…

data.name: 0134 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: #P06While I do feel bad for Miss Asahina, I don't believe it's wise to interrupt now.

data.name: 0135 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: #P06Why not?

data.name: 0136 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: #P06If we put an end to Miss Suzumiya's fun now…

data.name: 0137 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: #P06She may not yet be entirely satisfied.

data.name: 0138 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: #P06And you're gonna say it'll cause closed space or whatever to form.

data.name: 0139 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: #P06Yes—precisely.

data.name: 0140 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: #P06Due apologies to Miss Asahina, but for now let's just fondly watch over her.

data.name: 0141 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If it were me, I'd only get chills from being fondly watched by this guy.

data.name: 0143 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hey, what are you guys doing over there!?

data.name: 0144 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Don't dawdle or you'll lose sight of Mikuru!

data.name: 0145 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Just because I can't help her doesn't mean I won't watch out for her.

data.name: 0146 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: All I can do is stop Haruhi from getting further out of control, huh…

data.name: 0147 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: C'mon—we need to get closer.

data.name: 0148 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: If we get too close she may notice us.

data.name: 0149 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: But recording zoomed in makes the camera shake terrible.

data.name: 0150 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Like he said, we shouldn't get too close.

data.name: 0151 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Hyah… I-is someone there…?

data.name: 0152 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Everybody hide!

data.name: 0155 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: W-w-who's there?

data.name: 0156 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I told you so. Asahina seems to have noticed us.

data.name: 0157 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #SK0Ehhh… There's no one there… #W30I hate this—I'm scared—

data.name: 0158 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina was paralyzed in utter terror.

data.name: 0159 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I might have to put an end to Haruhi's ill-natured playtime soon.

data.name: 0160 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Asahina…

data.name: 0161 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: $4#SK0Noooooooooooo!! A f-face!!

data.name: 0162 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Errh—!

data.name: 0164 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It hurts… Asahina's hands went for my face…

data.name: 0165 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Aah! Kyon!

data.name: 0166 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Nice going Mikuru! I got the ultimate facial expression on video!

data.name: 0167 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Eeeh… You were recording me?

data.name: 0168 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You were so cute, Mikuru!

data.name: 0169 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Uuhhh… that's so meeaan…

data.name: 0170 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Haruhi looks ecstatic…

data.name: 0171 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I truly feel awful about everything Asahina's been put through.

data.name: 0172 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: For the record—I'm pretty miserable as well.

data.name: 0173 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: We'll have to thoroughly edit this video later!

data.name: 0174 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Haha—I'm looking forward to it.

data.name: 0176 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I'm certain it'll be a wonderful video once it's completed.

data.name: 0177 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Just what are you looking so happy about, Koizumi?

data.name: 0178 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Let's see if you can keep up that smile after stepping in my shoes for a single minute.

data.name: 0179 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: U-um, Kyon… Are you okay?

data.name: 0180 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yep. I'm completely fine.

data.name: 0181 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: It was just like the scary story—I suddenly saw a face, so I was really startled.

data.name: 0182 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …Oh.

data.name: 0183 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Tell me I'm wrong, but does that mean this was the actualization of Haruhi's ghost story?

data.name: 0184 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I'm really sorry…

data.name: 0185 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Not at all—it was all Haruhi's fault.

data.name: 0186 (376.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: What are you talking about? I'm heading back to the clubroom.

data.name: 0187 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: While seeing Haruhi off as she joyously left, camera in hand…

data.name: 0188 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …I was overcome by an unbelievably unpleasant feeling.

data.name: 0189 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Koizumi, has she ever told you ghost stories before?

data.name: 0190 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Of course, I only mean those specifically related to North High.

data.name: 0191 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I'm afraid not. Only ordinary ghost stories that could happen anywhere.

data.name: 0192 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: So that means she told it just to scare Asahina…?

data.name: 0193 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I don't think that's likely.

data.name: 0194 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: We can say Haruhi's story was actualized, but we can also say it was a coincidence.

data.name: 0195 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Either way—I've already thought about it more than I'd like.

data.name: 0196 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: We should begin our preparations now, wouldn't you say?

data.name: 0197 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Preparations?

data.name: 0198 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I'm talking about arranging a truth that would satisfy Miss Suzumiya.

data.name: 0199 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Some kind of set-up that would give her a false idea of what caused the phenomenon…?

data.name: 0200 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Precisely. Although I'm not sure specifically what the best way to do that would be.

data.name: 0201 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Can't you use your powers to show her Class 1-10 for real?

data.name: 0202 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Regrettably, my powers are simply not capable of such things.

data.name: 0203 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You certainly sound sure of yourself.

data.name: 0204 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: However, if we use a trick—showing her Class 1-10 should certainly be possible.

data.name: 0205 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: A trick?

data.name: 0206 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Something like replacing a class number plate?

data.name: 0207 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Well, not that I think such a classic method would be able to fool Haruhi…

data.name: 0208 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: That's a fantastic idea.

data.name: 0209 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …Are you serious?

data.name: 0210 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I'm very serious of course.

data.name: 0211 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I think so too.

data.name: 0212 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Even you, Asahina…?

data.name: 0213 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Do you usually look at the plate when you go to your classroom?

data.name: 0214 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Not really—it's intuition or muscle memory, I guess?

data.name: 0215 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: So, you don't pay any notice to the class plate, right?

data.name: 0216 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: If the plates were offset to the next class, you would go in without noticing, right?

data.name: 0217 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Let's see… The class at the far end is class six, so if we put class seven's plate instead…

data.name: 0218 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I see—so opposite class nine would be become an illusion of class ten.

data.name: 0219 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Yes. That's why your idea is so good.

data.name: 0220 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Even as the original proposer of the idea, I didn't think it through this far.

data.name: 0221 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: But, well—I guess it all worked out in the end.

data.name: 0222 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Well then, let's get straight to preparing it in that fashion.

data.name: 0223 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …Sure.

data.name: 0224 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I doubt she'd actually fall for such a thing, but I suppose it's worth giving a shot.

data.name: 0225 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Unfortunately, I'm not able to reach the plate…

data.name: 0226 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You can just get a chair or a desk from the classroom, right?

data.name: 0227 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It appears to be locked.

data.name: 0228 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Damn, I don't know what to do then…

data.name: 0229 (376.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I'll look for something we can use as a step up.

data.name: 0230 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: He's actually gone off to look, even though I'm not sure we have time for that.

data.name: 0231 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Asahina, I have a suggestion.

data.name: 0232 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Yes—what is it?

data.name: 0233 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: How about you use me as a platform and take the plates off?

data.name: 0234 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Ehh—well, t-that's…

data.name: 0235 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: We don't have much time here, so it could be trouble to wait for Koizumi to return.

data.name: 0236 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I-I see…

data.name: 0237 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The tender-hearted Asahina is hesitant about using me as stepladder…

data.name: 0238 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …But there's no way around it.

data.name: 0239 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I don't want to step on or be stepped on by Koizumi, but if its Asahina—no problem.

data.name: 0240 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Alright. Please make it quick.

data.name: 0241 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I-I understand…

data.name: 0242 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina stepped on my back slowly and nervously—as expected of our angel.

data.name: 0243 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She's light enough you'd think she grew wings.

data.name: 0244 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: How is it? Can you reach?

data.name: 0245 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I should be able to reach with just a little bit more.

data.name: 0246 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Then—I'm gonna try stretching a bit.

data.name: 0247 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Hyaa—y-you're wobbling.

data.name: 0248 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I'm sorry but, I can't really go much slower…

data.name: 0249 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I think… my fingertips can just about reach.

data.name: 0250 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Keep at it—Asahina.

data.name: 0251 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: W-woah woah, Kyon, if you move so suddenly my balance will—A-aahhhh—!

data.name: 0252 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Are you alright, Asahina?

data.name: 0253 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Hyaa—!

data.name: 0254 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Ugh!

data.name: 0255 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Asahina's foot slipped when her balance broke, and she fell on my back.

data.name: 0256 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I wanted to call her a fallen angel…

data.name: 0257 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …but then the plate fell on my head.

data.name: 0258 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Ahh—ouch…

data.name: 0259 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Kyon, I'm so sorry! Does it hurt? Are you okay?

data.name: 0260 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: N-no no, I'm fine of course.

data.name: 0261 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Ahhh, the plate left a mark on your head! It's not swelling, is it?

data.name: 0262 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: With but the caress of your hand, even such a wound would heal instantly.

data.name: 0263 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: We removed the plate, but it'll be hard to replace it…

data.name: 0264 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: What should we do? We've not got much time…

data.name: 0265 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: We don't have much time, and our options are limited. So what should we do?

data.name: 0266 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well… should we try it again? Just one more time?

data.name: 0267 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I think we should wait for Koizumi to return with something to stand on.

data.name: 0268 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: If I fall down again, you'll be crushed flat.

data.name: 0269 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: That part is fine—it's the direct hit from the plate I want to avoid.

data.name: 0270 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Ah! There should be a band-aid in my pocket…

data.name: 0271 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Here, Kyon.

data.name: 0272 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Th-thank you very much…

data.name: 0273 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I don't know if this #P05band-aid#P01 will help with my head, but…

data.name: 0274 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: If it's filled with Asahina's feelings of thoughtfulness, I'm very grateful.

data.name: 0275 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: There's no time and I don't want to wait for Koizumi—let's give up.

data.name: 0276 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I see… I'm sorry I couldn't help…

data.name: 0277 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Not at all! It's because of you that we were able to get the plate down.

data.name: 0278 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Although I don't know what this #P05class 6 plate#P01 will be useful for if anything…

data.name: 0279 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: But I should be grateful Asahina worked so hard to get me this plate.

data.name: 0280 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I might be able to find some use for it, so I'll take it with me.

data.name: 0281 (376.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Let's head back to the clubroom while keeping an eye out for Koizumi.

data.name: 0282 (376.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Okay.

data.name: 0283 (376.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Ah—I can feel my head throbbing.

data.name: 0284 (376.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Call out to Asahina.

data.name: 0285 (376.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Ask Koizumi to put a stop to this.

data.name: 0286 (376.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Try again.

data.name: 0287 (376.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Give up.
